languages.text: "Твой народ... Неужели... Благодетель{mf||ница}, Лорд-капитан, вы ли это?" {n}Лицо старика вытягивается.{/n} "Милостив{mf|ец|ица}, мы ж тебя знаем! Твоей щедростью живем, молимся за тебя! Что же ты здесь... Молю, ступай скорее, пока они не прознали! Они недоброе помышляют, прячут в этом ящике..."

"Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"

Твоей щедростью живем, молимся за тебя! Что же ты здесь... Молю, ступай скорее, пока они не прознали! Они недоброе помышляют, прячут в этом ящике..."

languages.text: "Eure Leute? Ist das möglich ... Unser Lord Captain, {mf|unser Wohltäter|unsere Wohltäterin}, seid Ihr das wirklich?" {n}Der alte Mann wirkt erschrocken.{/n} "{mf|Unser gnadenhafter Lord|Unsere gnadenhafte Lady}, wir kennen Euch wohl! Eure Wohltätigkeit bringt uns durch den Tag und wir beten stets für Euch. Aber was macht Ihr hier unten in diesem ... Bitte, kehrt um, ehe sie erfahren, dass Ihr hier seid! Sie planen etwas Schreckliches. In dieser Kiste verstecken sie ihre ..."
languages.original_text: "Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Leute? Ist das möglich ... Unser Lord Captain, {mf|unser Wohltäter|unsere Wohltäterin}, seid Ihr das wirklich?" {n}Der alte Mann wirkt erschrocken.{/n} "{mf|Unser gnadenhafter Lord|Unsere gnadenhafte Lady}, wir kennen Euch wohl! Eure Wohltätigkeit bringt uns durch den Tag und wir beten stets für Euch. Aber was macht Ihr hier unten in diesem ... Bitte, kehrt um, ehe sie erfahren, dass Ihr hier seid! Sie planen etwas Schreckliches. In dieser Kiste verstecken sie ihre ..."

languages.text: « Vos gens ? Par tous les... C'est vraiment vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Notre {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} ? {n}Le vieil homme semble stupéfait.{/n} Nous connaissons tous votre bienfaisance, Votre Gracieuse Seigneurie ! C'est elle qui nous permet de joindre les deux bouts et nous prions chaque jour pour vous ! Mais que faites-vous dans ce... Allez-vous-en vite avant qu'ils ne découvrent votre présence ici ! Ils manigancent quelque chose de terrible. C'est dans cette caisse qu'ils cachent leur... »
languages.original_text: "Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"

traits.locale_text: « Vos gens ? Par tous les... C'est vraiment vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Notre {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} ? {n}Le vieil homme semble stupéfait.{/n} Nous connaissons tous votre bienfaisance, Votre Gracieuse Seigneurie ! C'est elle qui nous permet de joindre les deux bouts et nous prions chaque jour pour vous ! Mais que faites-vous dans ce... Allez-vous-en vite avant qu'ils ne découvrent votre présence ici ! Ils manigancent quelque chose de terrible. C'est dans cette caisse qu'ils cachent leur... »

languages.text: «¿Su gente? Será... ¿Lord Capitán, nuestr{mf|o|a} benefactor{mf||a}, de verdad es usted?». {n}El anciano parece conmocionado por la sorpresa.{/n} «Oh, amable señor{mf||a}, ¡sabemos bien quién es! ¡Su generosidad nos ayuda a vivir día a día y rogamos siempre por usted! Pero ¿qué hace en este...? Por favor, ¡tiene que irse antes de que le descubran! Están tramando algo espantoso. Esta caja, ¡aquí es donde guardan sus...!».
languages.original_text: "Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"

traits.locale_text: «¿Su gente? Será... ¿Lord Capitán, nuestr{mf|o|a} benefactor{mf||a}, de verdad es usted?». {n}El anciano parece conmocionado por la sorpresa.{/n} «Oh, amable señor{mf||a}, ¡sabemos bien quién es! ¡Su generosidad nos ayuda a vivir día a día y rogamos siempre por usted! Pero ¿qué hace en este...? Por favor, ¡tiene que irse antes de que le descubran! Están tramando algo espantoso. Esta caja, ¡aquí es donde guardan sus...!».

languages.text: 「我が人民？まさか…我らがロード・キャプテン、我らの恩人、本当にあなた様ですか？」{n}老人は衝撃を受けたようだ。{/n}「お恵み深い陛下、ワシらはあなた様のことをよく知っております！陛下のお慈悲によってワシらは一日を乗り切れており、陛下のために祈っております！ですが、こんなところで何をなさって…どうか、あなた様がこちらにいることが知られる前に、急いでお立ち去りください！奴らは何か恐ろしいことを企んでおります。連中は、この木箱に何かを隠し…」
languages.original_text: "Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"

traits.locale_text: 「我が人民？まさか…我らがロード・キャプテン、我らの恩人、本当にあなた様ですか？」{n}老人は衝撃を受けたようだ。{/n}「お恵み深い陛下、ワシらはあなた様のことをよく知っております！陛下のお慈悲によってワシらは一日を乗り切れており、陛下のために祈っております！ですが、こんなところで何をなさって…どうか、あなた様がこちらにいることが知られる前に、急いでお立ち去りください！奴らは何か恐ろしいことを企んでおります。連中は、この木箱に何かを隠し…」

languages.text: “你的臣民？难道你……您是我们的舰长大人？我们的恩主？真的是您吗？”{n}老人看起来震惊不已。{/n}“仁慈的大人啊，所有人都听说过您！是您的慈悲让我赖以为生，我们永远为您祈祷！不过，您来这种地方干什么……？求您了，赶紧走，别让他们知道您来了！他们在策划可怕的阴谋。就是这个箱子，里面藏着他们的——”
languages.original_text: "Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"

traits.locale_text: “你的臣民？难道你……您是我们的舰长大人？我们的恩主？真的是您吗？”{n}老人看起来震惊不已。{/n}“仁慈的大人啊，所有人都听说过您！是您的慈悲让我赖以为生，我们永远为您祈祷！不过，您来这种地方干什么……？求您了，赶紧走，别让他们知道您来了！他们在策划可怕的阴谋。就是这个箱子，里面藏着他们的——”

languages.text: "Halkınız mı? Yoksa... Lord Kaptanımız, kurtarıcımız... Hakikaten siz misiniz?" {n}İhtiyar adam, şaşkına dönmüş görünüyor.{/n} "Muhterem {mf|lordumuz|leydimiz}, sizi çok iyi biliriz! Hayırseverlikleriniz sayesinde her günü sağ salim atlatabiliyoruz ve her daim dualarımızdasınız! Peki burada ne yapıyorsunuz?.. Burada olduğunuz fark edilmeden lütfen hemen geri dönün! Korkunç bir komplo kuruyorlar. Bu kasa, işte burada sakladıkları da..."
languages.original_text: "Your people? Could it be... Our Lord Captain, our benefactor, is it really you?" {n}The old man looks shocked.{/n} "Our gracious {mf|lord|lady}, we know you well! Your charity gets us through the day, and we pray for you always! But what are you doing down in this... Please, hurry away before they know you're here! They are plotting something terrible. This crate, it's where they hide their—"
